Fix route caching on Laravel v5.8 (#626)

Laravel v5.8 has a bit different way of getting environment variables.
The `ROUTING_LOCALE` variable is probably not set at boot time so it will not be available later on in the app lifecycle since `getenv` function is not used directly.
This fix is just using `getenv` as a fallback. Another option would be to just use it directly and not as a fallback for `env`.

Fix some url translations (#578)

* Add original url query to the result of getLocalizedURL.

* Change findTranslatedRouteByUrl so that it resolves URLs with their path rather than the full URL.
This will make it possible to match an URL when it has a query string (parameters that are not managed by Laravel).

* Fix extractAttributes so that it doesn't match the wrong route if the number of segment is the same. e.g: "item/1" shouldn't match "project/{project_id}".

* Fix extractAttributes so that URL that have an optional argument not present will still return the attribute with a null value. e.g: "item" matching "item/{item_id?}" will still return the "item_id" attribute, but null.

* Fix extractAttributes so that the attribute array won't return attributes from non matching routes. Also fix routes that have a smaller number of segment than the URL should be ignored since it's automatically not a match and would cause wrong matches.

* Fix extractAttributes so that empty value like a "0" inside a URL will still be treated as part of the URL. e.g: "page/0" for route "page/{page_number}"
Also fix that routes with only an optional argument would automatically be rejected as a match.

* Remove the possible left-over '/' generated in getURLFromRouteNameTranslated.

* Add more tests to testGetLocalizedURLFormat for some use cases it wouldn't pass before.

* Change getRouteNameFromAPath to use the URL path so that it ignores additional parameters and also remove excess '/' from both the translatedRoutes and the URL for the final check.
Add a new unit test for getRouteNameFromAPath.

* Fix extractAttributes so that it remove the current locale from the URL path. This way we can match it with the routes. Add tests for this use case.

* Removed overuse of the shortand if for the urlQuery

remove UTF-8 suffix from regional (#573)

* remove UTF-8 suffix from regional

@mcamara, @lotestudio this update is server configuration specific:
- some linux installations suffix locales with ".UTF-8", some with ".utf8"
- on Windows there is no suffix

I'd propose to remove the forced suffix from setLocale and put suggestion in docs that this need's to be set on a development env in config file.

Tweak PHP Composer settings (#434)

* Remove version and prefer-stable deps

Remove the version hint as suggested in
https://getcomposer.org/doc/04-schema.md#version
Any version or revision should be determined by a tag, branch or commit SHA.

Prefer stable deps for development.

* Apply some rules for TravisCI

Remove --dev flag as it's no longer honored.

Prefer dist over original sources for deps on Travis (performance).

Rename PHPUnit's config file (#433)

Usually, we use phpunit.xml.dist config files and allow developers overriding
them with their own phpunit.xml (if necessary) which is part of the .gitignore

Also sorting entries of .gitignore alphabetically.

Merge pull request #351 from SpadXIII/patch-1

Change the way the ServiceProvider registers the class

Change the way the ServiceProvider registers the class

When using constructor injection with the class name, each time a new instance is created.
With this change, the service provider registers itself using the full class name. This makes sure the same instance is used each time.

Also added an alias to keep backwards-compatibility.

Merge pull request #230 from CSWilson/CSWilson-added-getCurrentLocaleNative

Added a new getCurrentLocaleNative function

Added a new getCurrentLocaleNative function

Added a new ```getCurrentLocaleNative``` function, there are times when you want to display the current locale in the user's native language.  If a user selects Deutsch (German) in a drop down menu to charge their language to german, once the locale has been set and changed the site's language displays everything in German but the ````getCurrentLocaleName``` displays the word German not Deutsch.  So in cases like this use ```getCurrentLocaleNative``` instead of ```getCurrentLocaleName```.

Merge pull request #35 from jaumesala/master

Fix routing error if hideDefaultLanguageInRoute is true

Fix routing error if hideDefaultLanguageInRoute is true

There was a problem when changing from a language route to a
defaultLanguage route if hideDefaultLanguageInRoute was true.

Example
Linking from (1) to (2) we got NotFoundException
1. domain.com/en/services
2. domain.com/servicios

But from (1) to (2) and then (3) was OK
1. domain.com/en/services
2. domain.com/es/servicios
3. domain.com/servicios
